#### Problem 1

##### Load and clean data 
```{r}
#Load data
data("brfss_smart2010")
head(brfss_smart2010)

#Clean data  
brfss_data <- filter(brfss_smart2010, Topic == "Overall Health") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(response = factor(response, c("Excellent", "Very good", "Good", "Fair", "Poor")))
```
